blocks.name: qndenserrnbl
blocks.content: n-dimensional rational numbers are dense in the space of n-dimensional real numbers, with respect to the n-dimensional standard topology. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 24-Dec-2020.)

  diff.wa.s(s0, w0, hs0 ‚àà c1)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, hs0, c1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: qndenserrn
blocks.content: n-dimensional rational numbers are dense in the space of n-dimensional real numbers, with respect to the n-dimensional standard topology. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 24-Dec-2020.)

thm qndenserrn(class c0, class c1, wff w0) {

  sseqtrd(cfv(cfv(ccl, c0), co(cq, cmap, c1)), co(cr, cmap, c1), cuni(c0), w0)

  ralrimiva(hs1, c0, wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(cr, cmap, c1))), wi(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wne(cin(cv(hs1), co(cq, cmap, c1)), emptycls)))
  adantlr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(cr, cmap, c1)), wcel(cv(hs1), c0), wi(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wne(cin(cv(hs1), co(cq, cmap, c1)), emptycls)))
  ex(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs1), c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wne(cin(cv(hs1), co(cq, cmap, c1)), emptycls))
  sylibr(wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs1), c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))), wne(cin(cv(hs1), co(cq, cmap, c1)), emptycls), wex(hs2, wcel(cv(hs2), cin(cv(hs1), co(cq, cmap, c1)))))
  mpd(wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs1), c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))), wex(hs2, wcel(cv(hs2), cin(cv(hs1), co(cq, cmap, c1)))), wex(hs2, wa(wcel(cv(hs2), co(cq, cmap, c1)), wcel(cv(hs2), cv(hs1)))))
  sylib(wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs1), c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))), wex(hs2, wa(wcel(cv(hs2), co(cq, cmap, c1)), wcel(cv(hs2), cv(hs1)))), wrex(hs2, co(cq, cmap, c1), wcel(cv(hs2), cv(hs1))))
  qndenserrnopn(hs2, c1, cv(hs1), cfv(ctopn, cfv(crrx, c1)), wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs1), c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))))
  ad2antrr(w0, wcel(cv(hs1), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wcel(c1, cfn))
  ad2antlr(w0, wcel(cv(hs1), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wcel(cv(hs1), cfv(ctopn, cfv(crrx, c1))))
  syl6eleq(cv(hs1), cfv(ctopn, cfv(crrx, c1)), c0, wcel(cv(hs1), c0))
  id(wcel(cv(hs1), c0))
  adantl(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs1), c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wne(cv(hs1), emptycls))
  ne0i(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))
  df-rex(hs2, co(cq, cmap, c1), wcel(cv(hs2), cv(hs1)))
  eximdv(hs2, wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs1), c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))), wa(wcel(cv(hs2), co(cq, cmap, c1)), wcel(cv(hs2), cv(hs1))), wcel(cv(hs2), cin(cv(hs1), co(cq, cmap, c1))))
  a1i(wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs1), c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))), wi(wa(wcel(cv(hs2), co(cq, cmap, c1)), wcel(cv(hs2), cv(hs1))), wcel(cv(hs2), cin(cv(hs1), co(cq, cmap, c1)))))
  elind(cv(hs2), cv(hs1), co(cq, cmap, c1), wa(wcel(cv(hs2), co(cq, cmap, c1)), wcel(cv(hs2), cv(hs1))))
  simpr(wcel(cv(hs2), co(cq, cmap, c1)), wcel(cv(hs2), cv(hs1)))
  simpl(wcel(cv(hs2), co(cq, cmap, c1)), wcel(cv(hs2), cv(hs1)))
  n0(hs2, cin(cv(hs1), co(cq, cmap, c1)))
  syl3anc(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(cr, cmap, c1))), wb(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cfv(ccl, c0), co(cq, cmap, c1))), wral(hs1, c0, wi(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wne(cin(cv(hs1), co(cq, cmap, c1)), emptycls)))), wcel(c0, ctop), wss(co(cq, cmap, c1), cuni(c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), cuni(c0)))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(cr, cmap, c1)), wcel(c0, ctop))
  syl(w0, wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, cfn))
  rrxtop(c1, cfn, c0)
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(cr, cmap, c1)), wss(co(cq, cmap, c1), cuni(c0)))

  a1i(w0, wss(co(cq, cmap, c1), co(cr, cmap, c1)))
  mp2an(wss(co(cq, cmap, c1), co(cr, cmap, c1)), wcel(cr, universe), wss(cq, cr))
  reex()
  qssre()
  mapss(cr, universe, cq, c1)
  eleqtrd(cv(hs0), cuni(c0), co(cr, cmap, c1), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(cr, cmap, c1))))
  simpr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(cr, cmap, c1)))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(cr, cmap, c1)), wceq(co(cr, cmap, c1), cuni(c0)))
  3eqtrd(co(cr, cmap, c1), cuni(c0), cfv(cbs, cfv(crrx, c1)), cuni(cfv(ctopn, cfv(crrx, c1))), w0)
  eqcomd(co(cr, cmap, c1), cfv(cbs, cfv(crrx, c1)), w0)
  rrxbasefi(cfv(cbs, cfv(crrx, c1)), c1, cfv(crrx, c1), w0)
  eqid(cfv(crrx, c1))
  3syl(w0, wceq(cfv(cbs, cfv(crrx, c1)), cuni(cfv(ctopn, cfv(crrx, c1)))), wcel(c1, cfn), wcel(cfv(crrx, c1), ctps))
  rrxtps(c1, cfn)
  tpsuni(cfv(crrx, c1), cfv(cbs, cfv(crrx, c1)), cfv(ctopn, cfv(crrx, c1)))
  eqid(cfv(cbs, cfv(crrx, c1)))
  eqid(cfv(ctopn, cfv(crrx, c1)))
  a1i(w0, wceq(cuni(cfv(ctopn, cfv(crrx, c1))), cuni(c0)))
  eqcomi(cuni(cfv(ctopn, cfv(crrx, c1))), cuni(c0))
  unieqi(c0, cfv(ctopn, cfv(crrx, c1)))
  elcls(hs1, c0, co(cq, cmap, c1), cuni(c0), cv(hs0))
  eqid(cuni(c0))
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(cfv(ccl, c0), co(cq, cmap, c1)))
  diff.hs0.c(co(cr, cmap, c1))
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs1.w(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(cr, cmap, c1))))
  diff.hs2.c(c1)
  diff.hs2.c(cv(hs1))
  diff.hs2.w(wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs1), c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))))

  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(co(cq, cmap, c1))
  diff.hs1.c(cuni(c0))

thm qndenserrn(class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí((cls ` c0)`(‚Ñö[‚Ü¶]c1))=(‚Ñù[‚Ü¶]c1))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c1 ‚àà Fin)

} = {
  eqelssd(hs0, ((cls ` c0)`(‚Ñö[‚Ü¶]c1)), (‚Ñù[‚Ü¶]c1), w0)
  sseqtrd(((cls ` c0)`(‚Ñö[‚Ü¶]c1)), (‚Ñù[‚Ü¶]c1), ‚ãÉ c0, w0)
  syl2anc(w0, ((cls ` c0)`(‚Ñö[‚Ü¶]c1))‚äÜ ‚ãÉ c0, c0 ‚àà Top, (‚Ñö[‚Ü¶]c1)‚äÜ ‚ãÉ c0)
  clsss3(c0, (‚Ñö[‚Ü¶]c1), ‚ãÉ c0)
  eqcomd(‚ãÉ c0, (‚Ñù[‚Ü¶]c1), w0)
  mpbird((w0 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà(‚Ñù[‚Ü¶]c1)), hs0 ‚àà((cls ` c0)`(‚Ñö[‚Ü¶]c1)), ‚àÄ(hs1 ‚àà c0,(hs0 ‚àà hs1 ‚Üí(hs1 ‚ãÇ(‚Ñö[‚Ü¶]c1))‚â† ‚àÖ)))
  ralrimiva(hs1, c0, (w0 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà(‚Ñù[‚Ü¶]c1)), (hs0 ‚àà hs1 ‚Üí(hs1 ‚ãÇ(‚Ñö[‚Ü¶]c1))‚â† ‚àÖ))
  adantlr(w0, hs0 ‚àà(‚Ñù[‚Ü¶]c1), hs1 ‚àà c0, (hs0 ‚àà hs1 ‚Üí(hs1 ‚ãÇ(‚Ñö[‚Ü¶]c1))‚â† ‚àÖ))
  ex((w0 ‚àß hs1 ‚àà c0), hs0 ‚àà hs1, (hs1 ‚ãÇ(‚Ñö[‚Ü¶]c1))‚â† ‚àÖ)
  sylibr(((w0 ‚àß hs1 ‚àà c0)‚àß hs0 ‚àà hs1), (hs1 ‚ãÇ(‚Ñö[‚Ü¶]c1))‚â† ‚àÖ, ‚àÉ(hs2, hs2 ‚àà(hs1 ‚ãÇ(‚Ñö[‚Ü¶]c1))))
  mpd(((w0 ‚àß hs1 ‚àà c0)‚àß hs0 ‚àà hs1), ‚àÉ(hs2, hs2 ‚àà(hs1 ‚ãÇ(‚Ñö[‚Ü¶]c1))), ‚àÉ(hs2,(hs2 ‚àà(‚Ñö[‚Ü¶]c1)‚àß hs2 ‚àà hs1)))
  sylib(((w0 ‚àß hs1 ‚àà c0)‚àß hs0 ‚àà hs1), ‚àÉ(hs2,(hs2 ‚àà(‚Ñö[‚Ü¶]c1)‚àß hs2 ‚àà hs1)), ‚àÉ(hs2 ‚àà(‚Ñö[‚Ü¶]c1), hs2 ‚àà hs1))
  qndenserrnopn(hs2, c1, hs1, (TopOpen `(RR^ ` c1)), ((w0 ‚àß hs1 ‚àà c0)‚àß hs0 ‚àà hs1))
  ad2antrr(w0, hs1 ‚àà c0, hs0 ‚àà hs1, c1 ‚àà Fin)
  ad2antlr(w0, hs1 ‚àà c0, hs0 ‚àà hs1, hs1 ‚àà(TopOpen `(RR^ ` c1)))
  syl6eleq(hs1, (TopOpen `(RR^ ` c1)), c0, hs1 ‚àà c0)
  id(hs1 ‚àà c0)
  adantl((w0 ‚àß hs1 ‚àà c0), hs0 ‚àà hs1, hs1 ‚â† ‚àÖ)
  ne0i(hs0, hs1)
  df-rex(hs2, (‚Ñö[‚Ü¶]c1), hs2 ‚àà hs1)
  eximdv(hs2, ((w0 ‚àß hs1 ‚àà c0)‚àß hs0 ‚àà hs1), (hs2 ‚àà(‚Ñö[‚Ü¶]c1)‚àß hs2 ‚àà hs1), hs2 ‚àà(hs1 ‚ãÇ(‚Ñö[‚Ü¶]c1)))
  a1i(((w0 ‚àß hs1 ‚àà c0)‚àß hs0 ‚àà hs1), ((hs2 ‚àà(‚Ñö[‚Ü¶]c1)‚àß hs2 ‚àà hs1)‚Üí hs2 ‚àà(hs1 ‚ãÇ(‚Ñö[‚Ü¶]c1))))
  elind(hs2, hs1, (‚Ñö[‚Ü¶]c1), (hs2 ‚àà(‚Ñö[‚Ü¶]c1)‚àß hs2 ‚àà hs1))

  mp2an((‚Ñö[‚Ü¶]c1)‚äÜ(‚Ñù[‚Ü¶]c1), ‚Ñù ‚àà ùïå, ‚Ñö ‚äÜ ‚Ñù)
  reex()
  qssre()
  mapss(cr, universe, cq, c1)
  eleqtrd(hs0, ‚ãÉ c0, (‚Ñù[‚Ü¶]c1), (w0 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà(‚Ñù[‚Ü¶]c1)))
  simpr(w0, hs0 ‚àà(‚Ñù[‚Ü¶]c1))
  adantr(w0, hs0 ‚àà(‚Ñù[‚Ü¶]c1), (‚Ñù[‚Ü¶]c1)= ‚ãÉ c0)
  3eqtrd((‚Ñù[‚Ü¶]c1), ‚ãÉ c0, (Base `(RR^ ` c1)), ‚ãÉ(TopOpen `(RR^ ` c1)), w0)
  eqcomd((‚Ñù[‚Ü¶]c1), (Base `(RR^ ` c1)), w0)
  rrxbasefi((Base `(RR^ ` c1)), c1, (RR^ ` c1), w0)
  eqid((RR^ ` c1))
  3syl(w0, (Base `(RR^ ` c1))= ‚ãÉ(TopOpen `(RR^ ` c1)), c1 ‚àà Fin, (RR^ ` c1)‚àà TopSp)
  rrxtps(c1, cfn)
  tpsuni((RR^ ` c1), (Base `(RR^ ` c1)), (TopOpen `(RR^ ` c1)))
  eqid((Base `(RR^ ` c1)))
  eqid((TopOpen `(RR^ ` c1)))
  a1i(w0, ‚ãÉ(TopOpen `(RR^ ` c1))= ‚ãÉ c0)
  eqcomi(‚ãÉ(TopOpen `(RR^ ` c1)), ‚ãÉ c0)
  unieqi(c0, (TopOpen `(RR^ ` c1)))

blocks.name: rrxsnicc
blocks.content: A multidimensional singleton expressed as a multidimensional closed interval. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 8-Apr-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm rrxsnicc(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cixp(s0, c0, co(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), cicc, cfv(c1, cv(s0)))), csn(c1)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, co(cr, cmap, c0)))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  eqssd(cixp(s0, c0, co(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), cicc, cfv(c1, cv(s0)))), csn(c1), w0)
  ssd(hs0, cixp(s0, c0, co(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), cicc, cfv(c1, cv(s0)))), csn(c1), w0)
  syl(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cixp(s0, c0, co(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), cicc, cfv(c1, cv(s0)))))), wcel(cv(hs0), csn(c1)), wceq(cv(hs0), c1))
  eqfnfvd(hs1, cv(hs0), c1, c0, wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cixp(s0, c0, co(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), cicc, cfv(c1, cv(s0)))))))
  adantl(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cixp(s0, c0, co(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), cicc, cfv(c1, cv(s0))))), wfn(cv(hs0), c0))
  ixpfn(s0, cv(hs0), c0, co(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), cicc, cfv(c1, cv(s0))))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cixp(s0, c0, co(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), cicc, cfv(c1, cv(s0))))), wfn(c1, c0))
  syl21anc(wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cixp(s0, c0, co(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), cicc, cfv(c1, cv(s0)))))), wcel(cv(hs1), c0)), wceq(cfv(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cfv(c1, cv(hs1))), w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cixp(hs1, c0, co(cfv(c1, cv(hs1)), cicc, cfv(c1, cv(hs1))))), wcel(cv(hs1), c0))
  simpll(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cixp(s0, c0, co(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), cicc, cfv(c1, cv(s0))))), wcel(cv(hs1), c0))
  ad2antlr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cixp(s0, c0, co(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), cicc, cfv(c1, cv(s0))))), wcel(cv(hs1), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), cixp(hs1, c0, co(cfv(c1, cv(hs1)), cicc, cfv(c1, cv(hs1))))))
  biimpi(wcel(cv(hs0), cixp(s0, c0, co(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), cicc, cfv(c1, cv(s0))))), wcel(cv(hs0), cixp(hs1, c0, co(cfv(c1, cv(hs1)), cicc, cfv(c1, cv(hs1))))))
  eleq2i(cv(hs0), cixp(s0, c0, co(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), cicc, cfv(c1, cv(s0)))), cixp(hs1, c0, co(cfv(c1, cv(hs1)), cicc, cfv(c1, cv(hs1)))))
  cbvixpv(s0, hs1, c0, co(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), cicc, cfv(c1, cv(s0))), co(cfv(c1, cv(hs1)), cicc, cfv(c1, cv(hs1))))
  oveq12d(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), cicc, cfv(c1, cv(s0)), cfv(c1, cv(hs1)), cfv(c1, cv(hs1)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs1)))
  fveq2(cv(s0), cv(hs1), c1)
  simpr(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cixp(s0, c0, co(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), cicc, cfv(c1, cv(s0)))))), wcel(cv(hs1), c0))
  xrletrid(cfv(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cfv(c1, cv(hs1)), wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cixp(hs1, c0, co(cfv(c1, cv(hs1)), cicc, cfv(c1, cv(hs1)))))), wcel(cv(hs1), c0)))
  rexrd(cfv(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cixp(hs1, c0, co(cfv(c1, cv(hs1)), cicc, cfv(c1, cv(hs1)))))), wcel(cv(hs1), c0)))

blocks.name: rrnprjdstle
blocks.content: The distance between two points in Euclidean space is greater than the distance between the projections onto one coordinate. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 8-Apr-2021.)

thm rrnprjdstle(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wbr(cfv(cabs, co(cfv(c0, c1), cmin, cfv(c2, c1))), cle, co(c0, c3, c2)))

  -| wi(w0, wf(c0, c4, cr))

  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cds, cfv(crrx, c4)))
} = {
  eqbrtrd(cfv(cabs, co(cfv(c0, c1), cmin, cfv(c2, c1))), cle, co(c0, c3, c2), co(cfv(c0, c1), cres(ccom(cabs, cmin), cxp(cr, cr)), cfv(c2, c1)), w0)

  ffvelrnd(c0, c1, cr, c4, w0)
  ffvelrnd(c2, c1, cr, c4, w0)
  remetdval(cfv(c0, c1), cfv(c2, c1), cres(ccom(cabs, cmin), cxp(cr, cr)))
  syl22anc(w0, wbr(co(cfv(c0, c1), cres(ccom(cabs, cmin), cxp(cr, cr)), cfv(c2, c1)), cle, co(c0, c3, c2)), wcel(c4, cfn), wcel(c1, c4), wcel(c0, crab(hs0, co(cr, cmap, c4), wbr(cv(hs0), cfsupp, nat0))), wcel(c2, crab(hs0, co(cr, cmap, c4), wbr(cv(hs0), cfsupp, nat0))))
  eleqtrd(c0, crab(hs0, co(cr, cmap, c4), wbr(cv(hs0), cfsupp, nat0)), co(cr, cmap, c4), w0)
  mpbird(w0, wcel(c0, co(cr, cmap, c4)), wf(c0, c4, cr))
  elmapd(c0, cr, c4, universe, cfn, w0)
  eleqtrd(c2, crab(hs0, co(cr, cmap, c4), wbr(cv(hs0), cfsupp, nat0)), co(cr, cmap, c4), w0)

  a1i(w0, wcel(cr, universe))
  reex()
  eqtr3d(co(cr, cmap, c4), crab(hs0, co(cr, cmap, c4), wbr(cv(hs0), cfsupp, nat0)), cfv(cbs, cfv(crrx, c4)), w0)
  rrxbasefi(cfv(cbs, cfv(crrx, c4)), c4, cfv(crrx, c4), w0)

  rrxdstprj1(hs0, c4, cfn, c1, c0, crab(hs0, co(cr, cmap, c4), wbr(cv(hs0), cfsupp, nat0)), c2, cres(ccom(cabs, cmin), cxp(cr, cr)), c3)
  eqid(crab(hs0, co(cr, cmap, c4), wbr(cv(hs0), cfsupp, nat0)))
  eqid(cres(ccom(cabs, cmin), cxp(cr, cr)))

blocks.name: ioorrnopnxrlem
blocks.content: Given a point ` F ` that belongs to an indexed product of (possibly unbounded) open intervals, then ` F ` belongs to an open product of bounded open intervals that's a subset of the original indexed product. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 8-Apr-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm ioorrnopnxrlem(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {

blocks.name: ioorrnopnxr
blocks.content: The indexed product of open intervals is an open set in ` ( RR^ `` X ) ` . Similar to ~ ioorrnopn but here unbounded intervals are allowed. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 8-Apr-2021.)
